title: SimulatorAnnounce
description: Handshake of simulator with matchmaker to anounce simulator specification

purpose.description: Declares the intention of the code behind of the simulator

supported.description: Object which declares all supported settings for the simulator

max_instances.description: Declares the maximum amount of simulataneous game instances this simulator can run

provider.description: Contains identification of the person/group running/owning the simulator

identification.description: String to identify exact version and modules used by the simulator

scenario.description: Set of scenario identifiers supported by the simulator

ai.description: Set of AI identifiers supported by the simulator

gameID.description: Set of Game identifiers supported by the simulator
